description: Scales and Arpeggios Scale Practice helps musicians practice their scales, by randomizing the order of scales and providing resources to learn about new scales. It contains three different functions: 1. Random scale chosen from a list of scale types 2. Random scale chosen from a list of user inputted scales 3. Scale resources, including images of each scale and descriptions Features: * Diverse Scale Selection (Major, Natural Minor, Harmonic Minor, Melodic Minor, Major Modes, Melodic Minor Modes, Blues Scale, Pentatonic Scales, Octatonic Scales, Whole Tone Scales) * Arpeggio Practic * Resources to help you learn new scales * Random selection from user selected scales This app does not listen to you practice, or provide you feedback in any way. It is only designed to give you a new order to practice your scales in.
